attributes.action: Reverse cuts to the overseas aid budget, especially those affecting clean water
attributes.additional_details: At the moment the world as a whole is facing an unprecedented pandemic where no country has been unaffected. We, being one of the richest in the world have a duty to stand by those poorer countries. The government needs to stop and reverse any cuts that will cause more people across the world to die unnecessarily, just because of lack of access to clean water and poor sanitation.
attributes.background: Reverse the cuts to the overseas aid budget, especially those that affect clean water and sanitation

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not reduce the overseas aid budget (from 0.7% GDP): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561068

Stop proposed cuts to UK funding for clean water and sanitation overseas aid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584468
